description: This Python source file defines functions and classes for building a chess game with AI agents, including model selection and team configuration, utilizing external AI model classes and a team management framework.

methods.name: get_model_for_provider
methods.description: Creates and returns an AI model instance based on the specified provider and model name, supporting 'openai', 'google', 'anthropic', and 'groq'.

methods.name: get_chess_team
methods.description: Configures and returns a Team object representing a chess game with specialized AI agents for white, black, and game management, with options for models and debug mode.
